nodes.text: Andur Thorsim was a scout in the Rebel Alliance and later lieutenant in the New Republic Army. He was also a member of the Republic's Astrographic Survey Institute. He was the modern documentarian of the planet Corellia. In 4 ABY he and his fellow scout Glaennor was saved by Luke Skywalker from an Oskan blood eater released by mind-witch S'ybll.
